texts.name: Siniri
texts.biography: Siniri is a bit of a celebrity in the world of Tortofroids. She and her entourage are known as the Royal Gold fairytale brigade.

specialty.description: Increases the Attack and Defense skills of Tortofroids or Vile Tortofroids or each level attained after 2th level.
specialty.tooltip:
{Tortofroids}

Increases the Attack and Defense skills of Tortofroids or Vile Tortofroids
specialty.name: Tortofroids
